snippet: ROSEMAN--Lenore, 95, on February 13, 2016. A lifelong New Yorker who loved restaurants and theater, who served as Executive Director of the Dysautonomia Foundation, retiring in 2006. Beloved mother of Ellen Glucksman, Judy and Bill Caragher, grandmother of Kevin and Jessica, cherished friend of Stacy Ann Campbell. Service Monday at "The Riverside," please call for time 212-362-6600. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ROSEMAN--Lenore, 95, on February 13, 2016. A lifelong New Yorker who loved restaurants and theater, who served as Executive Director of the Dysautonomia Foundation, retiring in 2006. Beloved mother of Ellen Glucksman, Judy and Bill Caragher, grandmother of Kevin and Jessica, cherished friend of Stacy Ann Campbell. Service Monday at "The Riverside," please call for time 212-362-6600. 1/3
